HUBAUT*, J. P. BONNELLE (Villeneuve D'Ascq Cedex, France) and M. DAAGE (Annandale, NJ, U.S.A.) Page 180, last two lines before Table 3 should read: .... 3). In fact, these alkylphenyl carbinols, are only dehydroxylated to the corresponding hydrocarbons. In contrast, since they are not nucleo- philic .... The footnote to Table 3 should read: "Reaction conditions: liquid phase, 413 K, 1 atm pressure.
